title: Add error handling for API rate limits
description: Implement retry logic with exponential backoff for API calls in data_fetchers. Handle rate limit errors gracefully with user-friendly messages.

title: Add portfolio tracking functionality
description: Allow users to create and track multiple stock portfolios with performance metrics and aggregate analysis.

title: News sentiment analysis with scoring
description: Enhance news tab with sentiment analysis (positive/neutral/negative) for each news item. Show aggregate sentiment score and trend over time. Use simple keyword-based or LLM-based sentiment analysis.

title: Interactive chart with zoom and annotations
description: Replace static Streamlit charts with interactive Plotly charts. Add zoom, pan, hover tooltips, trend line annotations. Allow users to draw support/resistance lines.

title: Add SEC EDGAR as optional fundamentals source (US stocks)
description: Add an optional SEC EDGAR fundamentals backend for US stocks to improve accuracy/traceability of key fundamentals (authoritative filings/XBRL). Keep existing FMP/Finnhub implementation as the default to avoid breaking current behavior.

title: Implement Stooq CSV fetch + parsing module
description: Create the Stooq EOD price backend module and parsing logic.
notes:
Implemented Stooq EOD backend module and unit tests.

Changes:
- Added `src/data_fetchers/prices_stooq.py` with `fetch_price_history_stooq(symbol)` (CSV parsing + empty/HTML handling)
- Added `tests/test_prices_stooq.py` using mocked `requests.get`

Validation:
- `pytest -q` (6 passed)

Notes:
- This task does not change existing routing/default behavior; wiring via `PRICE_PROVIDER` is in sa-brx.

title: Stock comparison view (side-by-side)
description: Add ability to compare 2-4 stocks side-by-side with synchronized charts and metric comparison tables. Show relative performance, valuation differences, and correlation analysis.

title: Risk score dashboard with visual indicators
description: Create aggregate risk score (0-100) based on volatility, beta, drawdown, RSI, trend. Display as gauge chart with color zones (green=low risk, yellow=medium, red=high). Break down contributing factors.

title: Implement SEC companyfacts parsing into fundamentals payload
description: Fetch and parse SEC companyfacts JSON into a minimal fundamentals payload compatible with `fundamentals_summary`.

title: Improve test coverage for data fetchers
description: Add unit tests with mocked API responses for all data fetcher modules (prices, fundamentals, news, events).

title: Add price alerts and notification system
description: Allow users to set price alerts (above/below thresholds) and RSI alerts (overbought/oversold). Display alert indicators in UI when conditions are met. Store alerts in session state.

title: Testing
description: Add/extend automated tests to cover critical paths (fetchers, analysis, routing) and keep pytest green.

title: Reorganize Streamlit UI with tab-based layout
description: Transform the linear stock analyzer UI into a modern tab-based interface with dedicated sections for Technical Analysis, Fundamental Analysis, Charts, AI Insights, and News & Catalysts. Added color-coding for positive/negative values, tooltips for financial metrics, improved visual hierarchy, and better organization of all metrics.

title: Implement database storage for historical analyses
description: Use src/storage/db.py to store analysis results and track stock performance over time. Enable historical comparison and backtesting.

title: Add stock watchlist with multi-stock comparison
description: Allow users to create a watchlist of multiple stocks and view side-by-side comparison of key metrics (returns, P/E, RSI). Add ability to save watchlist to session state and compare performance across stocks.

title: Add PRICE_PROVIDER routing + docs for Stooq
description: Wire provider selection into existing `fetch_price_history` and document it.
notes:
Implemented PRICE_PROVIDER routing for Stooq without changing default behavior.

Changes:
- Added `PRICE_PROVIDER` to `src/utils/config.py` (optional; default unchanged)
- Updated `src/data_fetchers/prices.py` to route to Stooq only when `PRICE_PROVIDER=stooq`; otherwise use existing Alpha Vantage path.
- Updated `.env.example` and README with Stooq usage.
- Added `tests/test_price_provider_routing.py` to assert:
  - When PRICE_PROVIDER is unset and ALPHA_VANTAGE_KEY is missing, behavior is unchanged (RuntimeError)
  - When PRICE_PROVIDER=stooq, it routes to `fetch_price_history_stooq`

Validation:
- `pytest -q` (8 passed)

Git:
- Changes committed and pushed to origin/main.

title: Implement SEC ticker->CIK mapping + cached fetch
description: Add a reusable helper to resolve ticker to CIK with caching and required User-Agent.

title: Export analysis to PDF report
description: Add 'Export to PDF' button that generates a professional PDF report with all analysis tabs, charts, and LLM insights. Include company logo, timestamp, and disclaimer. Users can save or email the report.
notes:
Implementation completed.

Validation:
- `pytest -q` (3 passed)

Notes:
- Export uses ReportLab; embedded price chart is rendered via Matplotlib (Agg) when price history is present.
- Streamlit Overview now provides a single Download button that returns a PDF (no network calls during export).

title: Implement caching for API responses
description: Add caching layer using src/storage/cache.py to reduce API calls to Alpha Vantage, Finnhub, and FMP. Respect rate limits and TTL per provider.

title: Add support for multiple timeframes
description: Allow users to select different timeframes (1M, 3M, 6M, 1Y, 5Y) for technical analysis and charting in the Streamlit UI.

title: Remove SSL verification bypass for production
description: Replace httpx.Client(verify=False) in orchestrator.py with proper SSL certificate handling. Current workaround is only for development.

title: Quick action recommendations (Buy/Hold/Sell)
description: Add prominent, actionable recommendation in Overview section with clear Buy/Hold/Sell signal based on combined technical and fundamental analysis. Include confidence level and key reasons.

title: Sector and industry peer comparison
description: Show how the analyzed stock compares to its sector and industry peers. Display sector average P/E, returns, volatility. Add visual indicators showing if stock is outperforming or underperforming peers.

title: Add comprehensive unit tests for technical analysis
description: Write tests for RSI, MACD, EMA, volatility, and drawdown calculations in src/analysis/technicals.py

title: Add FUNDAMENTALS_PROVIDER routing + docs for SEC EDGAR
description: Wire SEC provider selection into fundamentals fetcher tooling and document usage.
notes:
Likely files:
- src/utils/config.py (add FUNDAMENTALS_PROVIDER + SEC_USER_AGENT)
- src/data_fetchers/fundamentals.py or src/agent/tools.py (route to SEC backend)
- src/data_fetchers/fundamentals_sec.py (new)
- .env.example + README.md

Non-breaking requirement:
- If FUNDAMENTALS_PROVIDER is unset, existing FMP/Finnhub behavior must remain unchanged.

SEC constraints:
- Must send a descriptive User-Agent string.
- Must cache requests (avoid repeated downloads).

title: Save and retrieve past analyses
description: Allow users to save analysis snapshots with timestamp. Store in local JSON files or session state. Add 'History' view to compare current analysis vs past analyses for the same stock.

title: Improve Recent News: tabular summary (Date/Source/Link)
description:
The app's "Recent News" section should show a compact table summary instead of a detailed view.

Goal:
- Replace the current detailed rendering in the "Recent News" section with a table that summarizes items.

Scope:
- UI-only change in the Recent News section.
- Keep existing news fetching/storage behavior unchanged.

Non-goals:
- No new filtering, search, pagination, or additional widgets.
- No redesign of other sections.

Likely files:
- src/app/streamlit_app.py (Recent News rendering)
- src/data_fetchers/news.py (only if needed to expose/normalize fields like source/url/date)
notes:
Updated Recent News table rendering in src/app/streamlit_app.py per updated request:

- Link now displays the article headline/title as clickable text (not the raw URL).
